blackCards.text: What's the secret to a happy life?
The worst thing to say on a first date is _______.
My therapist says I have issues with _______.
What ruined the family dinner?
The real reason I'm single is _______.
_______ is the key to world peace.
What's keeping me up at night?
The next viral TikTok trend will be _______.
My autobiography will be titled '_______'.
What's the worst superpower to have?
The secret ingredient in grandma's recipe is _______.
What's the worst gift to receive at a wedding?
_______ is why I got fired from my last job.
The last thing I want to hear from my doctor is _______.
What's the worst thing to find in your food?
My hidden talent is _______.
The government is secretly hiding _______ from us.
What makes a party truly unforgettable?
_______ is the real reason dinosaurs went extinct.
What's the worst advice you can give to a teenager?
_______ and _______ make a terrible combination.
Instead of studying, I spent my time on _______.
The airline lost my luggage but found _______.
What will historians remember about our generation?
_______ is why I have trust issues.
The worst thing to bring to a job interview is _______.
My New Year's resolution is to stop _______.
What's in my browser history?
_______ is my guilty pleasure.
The real reason I'm always tired is _______.
What would grandma say if she saw this?
_______ ruined my vacation.
The museum's newest exhibit: _______.
What's the worst thing to yell during a movie?
I wish I could unsee _______.
The dating app bio says: '_______'.
My spirit animal is _______.
_______ is why I'll never go back there.
What's the worst excuse for being late?
Step 1: _______. Step 2: _______. Step 3: Profit.

whiteCards: Accidentally liking a photo from 3 years ago
Pretending to laugh at your boss's joke
Replying 'lol' when you're not even smiling
Avoiding eye contact on public transport
Pretending you didn't see the text
That one embarrassing memory from 10 years ago
Stalking your ex on social media
Sending a screenshot to the wrong person
Waving back at someone who wasn't waving at you
Pretending to know what someone is talking about
Wearing pajamas to the grocery store
That weird smell nobody talks about
Pretending to be on a call to avoid someone
Walking into a room and forgetting why
Talking to pets like they understand
That one friend who never pays back
Pretending to work when the boss walks by
Saying 'you too' when the waiter says enjoy your meal
Being on mute during video calls
That one coworker who heats fish in the microwave
The weird uncle at family gatherings
Accidentally sending a message to the group chat
Turning the music down to see better while driving
Taking the elevator to go one floor
Pressing all the buttons in an elevator
Forgetting to unmute on a video call
